H0.text: In which town or city is the HQ of Colman's (of mustard fame). London

H1.text: In which town or city is the HQ of Colman's (of mustard fame). Birmingham

H2.text: In which town or city is the HQ of Colman's (of mustard fame). Manchester

H3.text: In which town or city is the HQ of Colman's (of mustard fame). Norwich

A4.text: Colman's is an English manufacturer of mustard and other sauces, formerly based and produced for 160 years at Carrow, in Norwich, Norfolk.

A5.text: Colman's was founded in 1814 at the Stoke Holy Cross mill on the River Tas, four miles (6.4 km) south of Norwich.
